name: Announce Door Closed
Set Google TTS On
func:
global.set("GoogleTTSDoorStatus", 1)
return msg;

name: Announce Door Open
Set Google TTS Off
func:
global.set("GoogleTTSDoorStatus", 0)
return msg;

name: Announce Washer Complete
Announce Dryer Complete
Set Google TTS Announce Level
func:
global.set("GoogleTTSAnnounceLevel", parseFloat (msg.payload))
return msg;

name: increase brightness
func:
msg.brightness = msg.brightness + 5
return msg;
